pr_title: [miio] add support for basic huayi lights

timeline.message:
[miio] add support for basic huayi lights

also remove some double spaces in json files

Signed-off-by: Marcel Verpaalen <marcel@verpaalen.com>

timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -90,6 +90,18 @@

     HUMIDIFIER("zhimi.humidifier.v1", "Mi Humdifier", THING_TYPE_BASIC),

replies.bodyText:
You are fully right.
I made a bigger rename now, as I finally figured out how to pull the proper names of the devices from the cloud
replies.author: marcelrv

timeline.message:
miio update devicenames
